comment_body:
Wow, halloween is already over but she's determined to become the Bride of Frankenstein for next halloween.

BoF aside, cool story. The ending is a bit predictable, but it's still horrifying nonetheless. Imagine getting kidnap because you took care of your hand. Scary. Good one.

Once I noticed your replies on one post, I seem to see them EVERYWHERE haha!

Slight exaggeration aside, I look forward to reading more of your comments; they're funny and also pretty insightful. Also, receiving feedback on writing is amazing (as I'm sure everyone here will agree to), so please dont stop! Thank you good sir!
Dude I noticed the comments too lmao
The comments is actually really hard for me to make, since I'm reallllllyyy paranoid that people will hate them. Thank you for the kind words :)

Trust me, I feel like a bunch of people (myself included) have a hard time feeling confident in posting. Couldnt even tell while reading your stuff that you felt that way. All your comments are gold, I'm excited to read the next one!
Wellll, I think some people hate my comment, so I'm going to tone it down a bit :P My intention is to make people happy, not to annoy them, so haha, maybe once every 6 story :D
Now I'm gonna have to time it so I get a comment on my next story haha!
Nah, just do one! If I see your story, I'll comment on it! I probably won't even follow the 5 story rule that I created, but it for certain won't be as common as before!
